# Hyponatraemia in Labour Decision Support Tool I'll create an interactive HTML page that implements the clinical guideline for hyponatraemia in labour. The page will feature a two-column layout with questions on the left and dynamic guidance on the right. ```html Hyponatraemia in Labour Decision Support
